bug.author: codeboy5
bug.description: The popular Q-learning algorithm is known to overestimate action values under certain conditions. Double Q Learning proposed in (<denchmark-link:https://arxiv.org/abs/1509.06461>https://arxiv.org/abs/1509.06461</denchmark-link> ) leads to a better performance in several games. I have started working on it and hoping to open a PR soon !!
